sections.title: Nature Warden (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Nature Warden class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Nature wardens gain no proficiency with any weapons or armor when taking this prestige class.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Nature Warden)
sections.description: At indicated levels, nature warden levels advance spellcasting progression of a previously held divine spellcasting class for spells per day and caster level only.

sections.title: Companion Bond (Ex) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Nature warden levels stack with other classes for animal companion abilities, grants empathic link, and at 5th level the companion gains favored terrain benefits.

sections.title: Natural Empathy (Ex) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Nature warden levels stack with wild empathy classes, adds favored terrain bonus to checks in favored terrain, and progressively allows affecting more creature types.

sections.title: Mystic Harmony (Su) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: While in favored terrain, gain an insight bonus to AC equal to half the favored terrain bonus, lost when immobilized or helpless.

sections.title: Wild Stride (Ex) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Nature warden and animal companion move through natural hazards of favored terrain at normal speed without damage or impairment.

sections.title: Animal Speech (Sp) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Can speak with animals at will in favored terrain or once per day outside favored terrain as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: Silverclaw (Su) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Animal companion and summoned creatures gain DR/silver equal to class level and their natural weapons count as silver.

sections.title: Favored Terrain (Ex) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Gains additional favored terrain selections at 5th and 10th level that stack with ranger favored terrain abilities.

sections.title: Survivalist (Ex) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: No penalty for improvised weapons or tools at 5th level, and can make them masterwork by spending 1 minute at 10th level.

sections.title: Woodforging (Sp) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Can use wood shape daily to create items that function as masterwork ironwood in the warden's hands and can be crafted into magic items.

sections.title: Companion Walk (Su) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Animal companion can share travel spells and polymorph effects cast by the warden from druid or ranger spell lists.

sections.title: Plant Speech (Sp) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Can speak with plants at will in favored terrain or once per day outside favored terrain as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: Ironpaw (Su) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Can grant animal companion and summoned creatures DR/cold iron instead of silverclaw, requiring meditation to switch between abilities.

sections.title: Guarded Lands (Ex) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Can designate areas up to 1 square mile as guarded lands, gaining enhanced favored terrain and favored enemy bonuses plus initiative bonuses for allies.

sections.title: Companion Soul (Su) (Nature Warden)
sections.description: Strengthens animal companion bond with increased devotion bonus, daily scrying ability, and ritual revival without negative levels.
